hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to common questions about the HEAL Student program and how to start your holistic health journey.

faqData.question: What is HEAL Student: Health, Emotion, and Active Living?

answer.intro: HEAL Student was created by researchers from the USA, Malaysia, and Indonesia with the goal of providing free courses to internet users.
answer.coverage: The courses provided include psychology, mental health, and balanced nutrition.

background.title: Background:
background.content: This platform is based on the increasing number of obesity cases in East Asia, particularly among adolescents.

faqData.question: Who can participate in this free course program?

answer.intro: This free course program is open to everyone. Access to HEAL Student is very easy so that everyone can access it.

expertNote.title: Our facilitators are experts in their fields
expertNote.content: so this platform is quite safe and reliable.

answer.intro: This program is launched publicly and has several courses in it.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.content: All six courses open every 3 weeks

support.title: Support
support.content: We provide mentors or facilitators to help your learning

answer.intro: HEAL Student offers 6 comprehensive courses designed to provide holistic understanding of health:

courses.title: Introduction to Balanced Nutrition and Eating Patterns
Implementation of Physical and Mental Health
Evaluation of Physical and Mental Health

faqData.question: How much does it cost to participate?

answer.implementation: You can follow the entire program and implement it in your daily activities without any charges.

faqData.question: What support is available for users during the program?

answer.intro: We are committed to providing full support to every program participant:

supports.title: Program Access Guide
supports.content: Registered users will receive a complete guide to access programs and courses.

supports.title: Professional Mentors
supports.content: We provide expert mentors in their fields to accompany your learning journey.

supports.title: Weekly Zoom Meetings
supports.content: Participants can attend weekly Zoom meetings to ask questions or get help with issues related to psychological health, mental health, and balanced nutrition.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Our team is ready to help you. Contact us or join the HEAL Student community for further support.
